title: 07/14/2021 - HOUR 1 - Rodgers, Kawhi, Big Ben
itunes:title: 07/14/2021 - HOUR 1 - Rodgers, Kawhi, Big Ben
description:
There's a possibility Aaron Rodgers gets traded to the AFC West by the trade deadline

Kawhi Leonard has surgery on his knee, where will he end up?

Big Ben is finally taking his health seriously


Guest: Nick Wright

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
